meanings.definition: Relating to the mind or mental processes.
meanings.sent1: Her psychical abilities helped her understand complex thoughts.
meanings.sent2: Studying psychology involves exploring various psychical aspects of the mind.
meanings.sent3: The psychical puzzle game challenged her to think deeply.
meanings.sent4: His psychical connection to others made him a great listener.
meanings.sent5: The therapist used psychical exercises to improve mental focus.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to psychic phenomena.
meanings.sent1: The psychic predicted the future using her psychical powers.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe in the existence of psychical abilities.
meanings.sent3: The psychical show amazed the audience with mind-reading tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her psychical intuition guided her to make the right decisions.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house was filled with psychical energy that gave chills.

meanings.definition: A person who is sensitive to psychic influences or forces.
meanings.sent1: She consulted a psychical to help interpret her dreams.
meanings.sent2: The psychical warned of negative energies in the room.
meanings.sent3: The psychical at the fair offered palm readings to visitors.
meanings.sent4: He sought advice from a psychical to connect with the spiritual realm.
meanings.sent5: The psychical's presence brought a sense of calm to the room.
